Fullstack developer with focus on Angula: Fullstack developer with focus on Angular and Java
aboutMe_content1: Hello, my name is Viktor, I am a passionate Web-Developer from Waldbroel.
aboutMe_content2: With enthusiasm for modern web technologies, I develop applications using Java Spring Boot, JavaScript, and Angular – both in personal projects and in teams, always open to new challenges.
aboutMe_content3: I am fascinated by the diversity of programming, and as a Junior Developer, I strive to continuously expand my knowledge and apply it practically in various projects.
aboutMe_content4: You are cordially invited to explore my public portfolio.
Feel free: Feel free to try out my latest development projects and look into their code..
This stop-smoking app tracks daily cigar: This stop-smoking app tracks daily cigarette consumption and shows saved cigarettes and money. Additionally, users can add or delete personal motivations and goals with prices.
The page may take up to two minutes to l: The page may take up to two minutes to load!
A software designed to efficiently manag: A software designed to efficiently manage manufacturing processes in machining operations. It allows for the management of employees, machine assignments, and project planning.
Task manager inspired by the Kanban Syst: Task manager inspired by the Kanban System. Create and organize tasks using drag and drop functions.
Jump, run and throw game based on object: Jump, run and throw game based on object-oriented approach. Help Pepe to find coins and tabasco salsa to fight against the crazy hen.

FamNotify is a real-time notification sy: FamNotify is a real-time notification system for families. Parents send reminders as emojis or GIFs, which children can acknowledge with a click. Thanks to Express, Vue.js, and Socket.IO, the transmission is instantaneous—ideal for short messages in everyday family life.
Discover my other projects, in which I c: Discover my other projects, in which I combine different technologies and approaches to expand my knowledge and skills.
URL Shortener is a full-stack web applic: URL Shortener is a full-stack web application that allows users to shorten long URLs into more manageable links. The application also provides analytics on the usage of the shortened URLs.
An Angular fake store. It serves as a sa: An Angular fake store. It serves as a sample application for using Angular features such as signals, routing, services, and HTTP client. It uses the FakeStore API as a data source and supports dynamic routing, category filtering, and shopping cart management.
